title: Formatting numbers is broken on RISCV (`no_std`) with LTO enabled
body:
Formatting numbers is broken on `riscv32i[m]-unknown-none-elf`, when `lto = "thin"` or `lto = "fat"`, for three-digit numbers and higher. For example `writeln!(&mut uart, "{} {} {}", 56, 123, 456).unwrap()` prints `56 023 0`. The whole counting sequence (hexadecimal on the left):
